channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Public litter bin overflowing, 22nd August
item.description:
The bin behind the engineers' cabin is overflowing with rubbish and dog poo bags. People are now fly-tipping around it. Please cleanse the area
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blandford Road, Penge, London

item.description:

item.title: Overgrown greenery, 22nd August
item.description:
This path is impossible to walk on any more safe. Its so overgrown. This path made of 5 tiles. Now visible left barly one... In my 5 years of use this path, I can confirm, its never been maintained. Many times I have reported this problem to council but they keep redirecting me to tfl.. and their ..back to council....

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Orion Road, Colney Hatch, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fence in desperate need of repair/replacement, 22nd August
item.description:
In the side road between Nos.17 and 15 Beechfield Road is a section of fence has been crumbling away for the past year, it must be repaired as soon as possible as it is dangerous due to splinters and nails etc. The adjacent temporary metal fence is also inadequate; it does not provide an effective barrier between the park and road and also falls over sometimes, though this has been fixed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beechfield Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car been left for 1 week in the same spot parked half on the road and half on the curb, 22nd August

item.title: White road markings missing, 22nd August
item.description:
The pavement was changed two months ago but the company have not put back the white parking box outside number 80 The drive. This was a bay and the ticket person has ticketed my daughterâ€™s car. They need to come back and do it please. Parking is limited as it is - thank you

item.title: To whom it concerns. The borough of Hackney, what does the mayor of Hackney actually do anyway. The borough of Hackney Council. Hackney Wick ward counsellors. Commissioner of the metropolitan police service. Safer neighbourhood police sergeant Terry & inspector Mohammed could you please address your fellow colleagues behaviors. Could you please address this lazy incompetent behaviour safer neighborhood police who sit in public parks all day playing on their mobile phones and smoking electronic E vapes on the job, gossiping and chatting all day. there was three male police officers from Hackney Wick ward safer neighborhood police rotor cpso tyrese, cpso Steven training officers alongside constable PC Luke who is addicted to smoking he's electronic vape cigarette which he carries on him at all times sometimes even glued to his hand or fastened to his body armor pocket. Experience qualified officer is teaching new recruits bad habits in the new career as met police officer. maybe the police think they need to be paid more.this is what taxpayers money is being spent on and wasted there is true good offices out there these free individuals are only a majority of the bad police officers.What happened to the old good Bobby on the beat. This is why crime and criminals are getting away in the local Hackney wick ward because of lazy and competent police officers who do not use their training or initiative to solve issues., 22nd August
item.description:
To whom it concerns. The borough of Hackney, what does the mayor of Hackney actually do anyway. The borough of Hackney Council. Hackney Wick ward counsellors. Commissioner of the metropolitan police service. Safer neighbourhood police sergeant Terry & insp

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Homerton High Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hackney Council authority and the commissioner of the metropolitan police service could you please address this lazy and competent behavior of cpso police officers not doing any policing sitting on benches all day and getting paid this is what taxpayers money goes on. Two male officers playing on their mobile phones waste the other female officer is doing her lottery numbers. Join the met become an officer make the change you want to see. Outstanding policing onwards and upwards. This is why antisocial behavior and criminal activities going on in Hackney officers not doing enough., 22nd August
